actions.committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

official_title: To amend title 49, United States Code, to extend the time during which air carrier liability for third party damages as a result of a terrorist attack may be limited, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends Federal transportation law to extend, beginning on September 22, 2001 through December 31, 2003, the period of time during which air carrier liability for third party damages as a result of a terrorist act may be limited to no more than $100 million, in the aggregate, for all claims arising out of such act.

titles.title: To amend title 49, United States Code, to extend the time during which air carrier liability for third party damages as a result of a terrorist attack may be limited, and for other purposes.
